title: Wanted Sharpshooter
description: A rogue mountain lion threatens a high-end wilderness horse training facility and the only person capable of ending the threat is the new hire, a former Army Ranger sharpshooter Max Abrams, and the only way he can save both horses and people is by taking charge and putting the entire place into lockdown, including the manager, Maggie Squires, who doesn't work well with other people, especially employees who tell her what to do. But she wants to save the horses and the facility.
author: Florence Witkop
